Articles.Content:
Two landers, one for low-gravity moons, one for everything except Eve and Tylo.

The Pisces:

![qTtgLtM.png](http://i.imgur.com/qTtgLtM.png)

And the Taurus:

![M1Kk22u.png](http://i.imgur.com/M1Kk22u.png)

The one thing that irks me is the Kerbal's tendency to exit the hatch sideways, but oh well. Leave some rep if you enjoyed! ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

I like your lander design, clean and elegant. Reusing the lander for a two staged one just makes it better.

Kudos.
Very nice looking ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) whats the DV on the two?
Looks nice, but personally, I try to avoid clipping as much as possible. Do you think you can redo this without clipping? Also, could you make the craft file available?
Please, PLEASE make a download link! These are so PERFECT! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
I'm a bit new, so allow me a bit of time to figure out how Dropbox and Mediafire work, but I'll try to have the .crafts up soon!
